item.title: What IoT history reveals about blockchain’s challenges
item.description: Note 2020-03-06: This was originally published as an opinion piece at Coindesk. Cave paintings vis https://www.shutterstock.com/pic-94533745/stock-photo-famous-prehistoric-rock-paintings-of-tassili-najjer-algeria.html 2009 saw Satoshi Nakamoto deploy the first Bitcoin node, and within five years its blockchain had become a large-scale industry. But while new applications and commercial opportunities seemed only a short step away, in 2016, we realized that industrial blockchains weren’t going to be so straightforward. Early enthusiasm for new technologies is nothing new.
